params._addresses: Array of contract addresses to be added

params.amount: The amount of controlledToken being minted
The amount of controlledToken being transferred

returns._0: True if the address is contained, false otherwise.
Returns the next address in the list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._address: The address to remove from the linked list.
params._previousContract: The address positionally located before the address that will be deleted. This may be the SENTINEL address if the list contains one contract address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: The address at the start of the list

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: MultiTokenListener is an ownable contract which holds a number of TokenFaucets

AddressAdded(address).notice: Emmitted when a contract has been added to the registry

AddressRemoved(address).notice: Emmitted when a contract has been removed to the registry

AllAddressesCleared().notice: Emitted when all the registry addresses are cleared

addAddresses(address[]).notice: Adds addresses to the linked list. Will revert if the address is already in the list.  Can only be called by the Registry owner.

addressType().notice: Storage field for what type of contract this Registry is storing

beforeTokenMint(address,uint256,address,.notice: Pass through the beforeTokenMint hook to all the registry TokenFaucets

beforeTokenTransfer(address,address,uint.notice: Pass through the beforeTokenTransfer hook to all the registry TokenFaucets

clearAll().notice: Removes every address from the list

contains(address).notice: Determines whether the list contains the given address

end().notice: Exposes the end of the list

freeze().notice: Freezes the contract, so that there is no owner.

getAddresses().notice: Returns an array of all contract addresses in the linked list

removeAddress(address,address).notice: Removes an address from the linked list. Can only be called by the Registry owner.

start().notice: Gives the address at the start of the list

userdoc.notice: MultiTokenListener passes through the ControlledToken beforeTokenMint and beforeTokenTransfer hooks to each TokenFaucet in its registry
